title: What is Zapier?
content: Zapier is an automation platform that connects your work apps and does repetitive tasks for you.

title: How does Zapier automate my work?
content: Zapier automates your work by connecting your apps and then moving information between them based on rules you set.

title: What apps can I connect with Zapier?
content: Zapier connects 4,000+ of the most popular work appsâ€”more than any other platform.
